original_text: So Joseph arrived at where his brothers were. He was wearing his special coat, but they took it off him.
korean_text: 요셉이 형들에게 이르매 그의 형들이 요셉의 옷 곧 그가 입은 채색옷을 벗기고

sentences.original_text: He was wearing his special coat
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 특별한 외투를 입고 있었다

sentences.original_text: but they took it off him
